name: BlueTiger Web Hosting
overview:
Business Web Hosting is our Specialty but it’s not the only service we have. At Blue Tiger Hosting we offer Small Business Web Hosting, Dedicated Server Hosting, E-Commerce Hosting, SSL Certificates and Domain Name solutions with 24/7 Support and 99.9% Up time at an affordable price. With our 30-Day Money Back Guarantee you have nothing to lose!

Why Us?

Your website is your potential customers, business associates and other interested visitors first impression of you. At BlueTiger Hosting we understand this and our solid solution ensures that your website and email always service runs perfectly! .

About Us

The BlueTiger brand was built back in 2007, we originally started out as a web design business providing cost effective web sites for small to medium businesses. As a web design business we were extremely successful, however we came to notice that there were no web hosting companies with a product that was designed specifically for businesses. So in 2008 BlueTiger Web Design changed into BlueTiger Hosting a web hosting businesses aimed at providing small to medium businesses with high quality hosting and support that a business deserves.

Great Support

We are staffed 24 hours a day, 365 days of the year. When you need assistance our staff is always ready to deliver friendly and helpful responses as quickly as possible. Any support request that is submitted through our specified support channels is guaranteed to receive a swift response. Our average response time is 30 minutes..

Privacy Included

We keep your details private and do not share your information with anyone. In addition to our strict privacy policy we also offer WhoIs privacy. With our optional WhoIs Privacy service you avoid exposing your personal information to the public via the central domain owner databases.

Trusted by Many

At this exact moment we host over 100 websites. Hundreds of webmasters, businesses and individuals turn to BlueTiger Hosting for their hosting needs - we would love to host your website also!
